name: 2DAY
description:
This is a short CYOA game. You choose your fate entirely through decisions in menu boxes. First, choose whether you want to get to your destination the fast way or the slow way. Mystery ensues.

The first version of this was uploaded as part of 2022's Global Game Jam, created in just under 48 hours with assets made by a team of online friends. This version contains some minor fixes and additions, including reasons to think about your choices a bit more...

Caution: Because this game was exported in RPG Maker MV, the Mac export breaks on OS Big Sur 11.0 or later.
